June 26, 1937 D Reading and District Band League Annual Contest (First Section)
Reading and District Band League Annual Contest (First Section) 10 Test Piece Contest Reading and District Band League Annual Contest reading-and-district-band-league-annual--4181
None
Recollections of Verdi
Riverside Meadow, Pangbourne, Berkshire Prizes - 1st £6, 2nd £4. Deportment: Spring Gardens, judged by J. Pitts, Late Royal Berks. Regt.
4 bands competed.
The programme from which these results are taken is found copied in the centre pages of the 1978 Reading Band Festival programme, where it is incorrectly described as the programme for the first contest in that series (which event took place on 25th October 1930). The year is not given, but original reports demonstrate that it was 1937.
